statements: UPDATE virtual_lab_environment SET lab_status = TRUE WHERE lab_id = 1

UPDATE virtual_lab_environment SET lab_status = TRUE, lab_description = 'Updated description' WHERE lab_id = 1;
UPDATE virtual_lab_environment SET lab_name = 'New Lab Name', lab_status = FALSE WHERE lab_id = 2;

UPDATE lab_environment SET lab_name='New Lab 1' WHERE lab_id=1;
UPDATE lab_task SET task_description='Updated Task Description' WHERE task_id=2;
UPDATE lab_environment SET lab_description = 'Lab environment description updated' WHERE lab_id = 1;
UPDATE lab_progress SET progress_status = 'Completed' WHERE task_id = 2 AND student_id = 101;

UPDATE courses SET course_credit = 4 WHERE course_id = 2;
